example.text: If New York City’s far-left mayor can admit the US is not ready for the surge of migrants that the end of Title 42 will bring, why can’t the President of the United States or the Secretary of the Department of Homeland Security do the same? [[url]]

Please place this letter into the committee report on HR 2670 and into the Congressional Record during consideration of the measure on the House floor. Thank you for the cooperative spirit in which you have worked regarding this matter and others between our respective committees.

While the Biden administration sits idly by, [[user]] is passing real solutions to the border crisis. I was proud to join my colleagues in supporting HR 2 to secure our border, and I hope to see it signed into law soon. [[url]]

If New York City’s far-left mayor can admit the US is not ready for the surge of migrants that the end of Title 42 will bring, why can’t the President of the United States or the Secretary of the Department of Homeland Security do the same? [[url]]
Hon. Mike Rogers, Chairman, Committee on Armed Services, Washington, DC. Dear Chairman Rogers: I am writing to you concerning HR 2670, the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2024.

While the Biden administration sits idly by, [[user]] is passing real solutions to the border crisis. I was proud to join my colleagues in supporting HR 2 to secure our border, and I hope to see it signed into law soon. [[url]]
